content.match_overview: Chelsea hosts Leicester City at Stamford Bridge in a crucial Premier League clash with contrasting objectives. Chelsea (5th) aims to reclaim a top-four spot after a 3-1 win over Southampton revitalized their campaign[1][7], while Leicester (19th) battles relegation amid a four-game scoreless drought[7]. Historically, Chelsea dominates this fixture with five wins in their last six H2H matches[5]. The Blues' defensive reinforcements (Fofana, Badiashile) return[1], while Leicester's attack struggles without Pereira and Fatawu[2][7].
